cast.name: 杰罗恩·克拉比 Jeroen Krabbé
莫妮卡·梵·德·冯 Monique van de Ven

introduction: It's All Film offers nine Dutch historical films from 1945 to the present. Vivid memories are interspersed with special clips. Including: Willeke van Ammelrooy, Jan de Bont, Kees Brusse, Paul Driessen, Michael Dudok de Wit, Louis van Gasteren, Heddy Honigmann, Carice van Houten, Pieter Kuijpers, Nanouk Leopold, Dick Maas, Dana Nechushtan, Mimoun Oa ssa, Pim de la Parra, Fons Rademakers, Renee Soutendijk, Huub Stapel, Jos Stelling, Eddy Terstall, Monique van de Ven, Pieter Verhoeff, Paul Verhoeven, Yorick van Wageningen, Alex van Warmerdam and Frans Weisz.
